item.title: R3 Consortium Adds Toyota Financial Services As New Partner
item.description:
R3 Consortium Adds Toyota Financial Services As New Partner

Toyota Financial Services is not your average bank, as the company focuses on automotive financial services. They are also the first player in that particular industry to join the R3 consortium. The R3 Consortium is a collection of several dozen financial institutions all over the world looking to explore blockchain technology.

item.title: Easier to Buy a Gun than Open a Bank Account? Use Bitcoin
item.description:
Easier to Buy a Gun than Open a Bank Account? Use Bitcoin

Stringent Know Your Customer ( KYC) norms and tedious opening account procedures have made opening a bank account in the US more difficult than buying a gun. Could Bitcoin fill the void for a universally accessible bank account?

item.title: Poland to Explore Blockchain Tech in Government Digitization Effort - CoinDesk
item.description:
Poland to Explore Blockchain Tech in Government Digitization Effort - CoinDesk

Poland's Ministry of Digital Affairs is taking steps that may find it promoting digital currencies and blockchain technology. The agency announced an expansive digitization plan last week that comes amid a broader drive among European regulators to understand the emerging tech.

item.title: Bitcoin Price - Decline Inside A Channel Of Advance
item.description:
Bitcoin Price - Decline Inside A Channel Of Advance

The bitcoin price chart fell through another level of support earlier today, but is clawing its way back to $600. How will we know if the next upward wave is advance or merely a correction? The 1-day candle chart indicators give us clues. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Reversal or Continuation? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Reversal or Continuation? - NEWSBTC

Here's what's on in our bitcoin price trading strategy this evening. The European session is about to draw to a close, it's time to take a second look at the action seen in the bitcoin price market today.

item.title: Member of R3 Finland's OP Financial Group is Recruiting Blockchain Talents
item.description:
Member of R3 Finland's OP Financial Group is Recruiting Blockchain Talents

During 2016, OP will be hiring over 100 digital experts to fulfill its mission of promoting sustainable prosperity and security and get OP through this financial breakthrough. Newspaper Tivi writes that digital experts will be needed to take on the roles of enterprise leaders and developers or heads of new projects in Blockchain technologies, IoT and cloud computing architecture.

item.title: Toyota Financial Services Joins R3 Consortium - CoinDesk
item.description:
Toyota Financial Services Joins R3 Consortium - CoinDesk

Toyota Financial Services, the financial services subsidiary of the Toyota Motor Corporation, has joined banking consortium R3CEV, making it the first organization affiliated with a major automaker to take part in the cross-industry effort. While Toyota Financial Services largely spoke in broad terms about its strategy, the company did indicate it could seek to leverage distributed ledger tech for non-financial use cases.

item.title: US Regulators to Hold Defining Forum on Fintech in Washington
item.description:
US Regulators to Hold Defining Forum on Fintech in Washington

Thomas J. Curry, Comptroller of the Currency, opened today the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) Forum on Supporting Responsible Innovation in the Federal Banking System at OCC's headquarters in Washington DC which brought together "thought leaders from banks, financial technology companies, academia, community and consumer groups."

item.title: New FCC Rules Could Block Your E-Wallet
item.description:
New FCC Rules Could Block Your E-Wallet

On June 14, a three-judge panel of the D.C. Court of Appeals rendered a surprise 2-to-1 decision that handed the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) complete authority to enforce Net Neutrality. Also read: Kazakhstan Exploring 'Number of Options' for Blockchain Use It was a surprise because only a partial FCC victory was predicted.

item.title: Bitcoin prices plummet after technical glitches spook investors
item.description:
Bitcoin prices plummet after technical glitches spook investors

By Bitcoin prices have cratered recently as a series of recent events, including a trading halt at one major exchange, has left some investors rattled. The price of a single coin shed more than $100 dollars in the span of five hours late Wednesday, falling from $669 to a low of $554 shortly before midnight Eastern Time, according to data from CryptoCompare.
